string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: "See all your apps. Touch the Launcher icon. @drawable/all_apps"
"Drag apps to your Home screen. Touch & hold an app in the Launcher until it vibrates."
"Rearrange your Home screen. Touch & hold an item and when it vibrates, drag it where you want it to go."
"Remove items. Touch & hold an item and when it vibrates, drag it to the Recycle Bin icon. @drawable/recycle bin"
"Multiple Home screens. Swipe left or right to switch. Drag items to other screens."
"Finished with this widget? Touch & hold it and when it vibrates, drag it to the Recycle Bin icon."
